Activity: Start the day with a quick review of yesterday's work and emails. Address any urgent requests or feedback received overnight.
Follow up with @qres-1, @qres-2, @qres-3, and @cio-1 regarding feedback on the marketing material content.
Incorporate feedback from @qres-1, @qres-2, @qres-3, and @cio-1 into the brochure copy and video script. Refine the language, clarify any confusing points, and ensure accuracy.
Finalize the brochure copy and video script. Send the final versions to the graphic designer for production. Provide clear instructions and deadlines.
Begin working on the second goal: 'Refine the communication strategy based on feedback from potential investors.' Review existing communication materials and identify areas for improvement.
Lunch break. Meet with @ir-1 and @onbd-1 to discuss potential investor profiles and gather feedback on the current communication strategy.
Based on feedback from @ir-1 and @onbd-1, develop a revised communication strategy. Consider different communication channels, messaging styles, and frequency of communication.
Draft a communication plan outlining the key messages, target audience, communication channels, and schedule of activities. Share the plan with @ir-1 for review.
Research potential platforms for distributing marketing materials to UHNWIs, such as targeted online advertising, exclusive events, and private wealth management networks.
Summarize progress on the second goal and outline the next steps for tomorrow. Review emails and respond to any outstanding inquiries.
